        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="39970" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="39970" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.05</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="4766">4,766</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="702"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Sweet Like Candy</b> by <b>Ariana Grande</b> is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. <b>Sweet Like Candy</b> was launched in 2016. Top notes are Blackberry, Pear and Bergamot; middle notes are Whipped Cream, Marshmallow, Black Currant, Frangipani, Jasmine and Honeysuckle; base notes are Vanilla and Cashmere Wood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>The third fragrance from the American pop singer Ariana Grande, after the debut of Ari in 2015 and the unisex edition named after her brother Frankie from 2016, comes out under the name of Sweet Like Candy in the standard bottle shape of the collection. Again, the flacon has a fluffy pom-pom, but this time it's colored in a matt light - pink finish.</p>

<p>Sweet Like Candy is the smell of berries, candies and vanilla. The top notes of sugar frosted blackberries and fresh Italian bergamot lead to the heart of cassis cream and a fluffy marshmallow accord. The gourmand  composition ends with vanilla and precious woods.</p>

<p>Sweet Like Candy is available as a 50 ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                 <div style="position: relative;padding-top: 100%">

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="39970"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98726063291633; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.169.jpg" style="width: 3.9rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Blackberry-169.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Blackberry</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.86862915010152; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.182.jpg" style="width: 3.125rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pear-182.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pear</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.78283876109963; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 2.7rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.454.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cream-454.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Whipped Cream</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; </pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98070561712475; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 3.85rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.74136644894489; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.343.jpg" style="width: 2.525rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cashmir-wood-343.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cashmere Wood</div></div></div>

</div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><gender-widget :perfume_id="39970"></gender-widget></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><price-value-widget :perfume_id="39970"></price-value-widget></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><similar-perfumes :perfume_id="39970" title="This perfume reminds me of"><div class="strike-title">
  <span>
    This perfume reminds me of
  </span>
</div>
<div class="carousel">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371104" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mansisri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2348218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mansisri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2348218">mansisri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733358688" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a cute, youthful sweet sent. This doesn't last a long time on me, so I wear this to the gym. I would say this lasts only 2/3 hours on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2371104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2371104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2369056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369056" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="violetaura"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1491123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1491123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="violetaura" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-Over-Red-88707.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88707.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium Over Red"title="Black Opium Over Red"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369056ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369056" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1491123">violetaura</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733220845" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The most simple of Ari's fragrances and its hard to say a lot about it. It's just a nice, sweet, candy scent, like the smell of any random hard candy, maybe with a little bit of lemon or sherbet tang. Also very linear and not very long lasting. I don't think I care to own it, but if i ever get bored of my current easy-reach gourmands (Meow, Ari, Fantasy) i might buy Sweet Like Candy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2369056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2369056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366509" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366509" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mayinwonderland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343141"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2343141.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mayinwonderland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366509ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366509" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343141">mayinwonderland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 17:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>super sweet and gourmand; you can definitely smell the blackberries, pear, and marshmallows. i am usually not the biggest fan of super sweet scents, but something about this is also very cozy and powdery. this definitely suits younger girls or someone that is looking for an outgoing, girly scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1468168">Boston730</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 14:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Girly, fruity and soft.  It does give me tart and sweet candy vibes.  It doesnt last very long at all though.  I sprayed it for the first time about an hour ago and the scent is already very faint.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2365263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2365263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364728" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364728" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emeliestar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/449280"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.449280.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emeliestar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364728ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364728" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/449280">Emeliestar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-29">11/29/24 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Though its nothing exeptional I keep coming back to it, time and time again. Quite juvenile, very inoffensive. The opening is fruity &amp; sweet (without being sickly sweet), which develops into something softer, creamier and a bit warmer.<br />
<br />
Downside: Extremely poor longevity and sits very close to the skin, almost gone by 2 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2364728"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2364728#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

body works. sillage and longevity are unfortunately very poor. apart from the longevity issue, its a pleasant, youthful sweet scent. lacking in complexity compared to other scents, including other AG fragrances and similar youthful celebrity products. imo this could be a great first perfume for a young girl, since its cheap and doesnt project too much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355769" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shijazin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2326503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="shijazin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2326503">shijazin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly not a fan of this. It smells like raspberry, which im not a fan of in a fragrance, and less like a candy. It is not very lactonic to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2355769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2355769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355320" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243904">Joyandsparklesx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 18:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very citrusy opening. Bright and fresh, then the sweetness starts to develop. Nothing too gourmand, more of a bubblegum type of scent. Smells a lot like shampoo or body wash. Very clean scent. This would be a very safe bet if you love sweet fragances and you live in a hot tropical weather. Very wearable</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2352483"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2352483#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351943" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351457" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="startoonish"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1993061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1993061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="startoonish" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Phlur/Vanilla-Skin-87258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Skin"title="Vanilla Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351457ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351457" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1993061">startoonish</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 19:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>ive already left a review for this one but i put it on again for the first time in a while and i thought i ought to be nicer to this perfume. <br />
<br />
my school had a dance, and the theme was candyland, so i thought what better fragrance to wear than this? three lucky sprays and i was hit with this delicious, gummy-like, tart blackberry. its such a palpable candy scent, it absolutely lives up to its name. i wanted to lick it off my wrist, so, so sweet, but still manages to be tart and bright!<br />
<br />
after about three hours of jumping around on the dance floor to the cha cha slide and the cupid shuffle, this scent had mostly worn off. perspiration probably covered most of the vanilla-marshmallow-whipped cream notes, but i could still smell a lingering sweetness on my skin afterwards. <br />
<br />
i think this scent, like most of ariana grandes scents, is best suited to energetic parties. they pack a (good) punch in the opening, theyre youthful, theyre fun, and theyre bright. theyre a little juvenile, but isnt that how you want to smell at homecoming? pink frilly dresses, lollipops, strobe lights, chunky high-heeled boots, thats what this scent is giving to me. just a fun, fun, easy fragrance. not my personal style but im sure if you like young, fruity gourmands youll enjoy this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2351457"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2351457#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2350081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2300007">svalerie01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 18:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this as a gift and unfortunately, this scent was pretty underwhelming for me. All I got was some very watered down berry and floral notes with a tiny bit of sugar; my nose didn't register any of the vanilla, marshmallow, or whipped cream. It's very "meh". It also doesn't last very long. Maybe I just got a bad bottle? Overall, I dislike it and probably won't use it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2339330"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2339330#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My go to everyday scent and somehow its still there. It starts out refreshingly floral and sweet with fruity juicy notes, after about 5 hours of wear it smells just like marshmallows and berries but it's far more intimate. It's completely inoffensive and it doesn't smell bad after a while of smelling it. I've gotten compliments from my friends every time I hug them too if that helps.<br />
<br />
I literally love this sm. Fantastic for blind buys too I don't think anyone other than my brother has said ewwww.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2334885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2334885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its warm and perfect for everything just get it 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2327625"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2327625#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326693" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067">ejayne64</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 18:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I owned this in my late teens and got it as a gift. I'd owned Ari before and LOVED that. It was a more mature step up for a sweet perfume lover from my beloved Katy Perry Meow (amongst other things). I got lots of compliments on Ari and thought I'd love this, naturally. It was nice, but I didn't love it as much. I feel Ari had more personality and depth. It was different than other perfumes I'd smelt, whereas this one felt watered down, less complex and almost reminiscent of a Juicy Couture to me. Inoffensive, however.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2326693"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2326693#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323252" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Citrush"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2062725"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2062725.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Citrush" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51694.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Her"title="Burberry Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2062725">Citrush</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 18:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like a jamba juice store</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2323252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2323252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319125" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bebelusica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259573"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259573.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bebelusica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Golden-Sand-20101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Golden Sand"title="Golden Sand"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259573">Bebelusica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 16:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly, this is a very cute perfume. Its light-hearted, sugary, and fruity. Its creamy and pleasant to smell, not offensive or overly sweet. The blend is smooth and manages to mix various notes of fruits, florals, and gourmands into a sweet little fruit salad with whipped cream on top.<br />
<br />
I blind-bought this one or two years ago, and I was kind of disappointed, though I can't pinpoint exactly why. Maybe it was the way it performs. Its not a long-lasting fragrance, and it can come off as juvenile in some ways.<br />
<br />
When I smell it up close on my skin, it reminds me of fruity deodorant sprays from the 2000s. It also reminds me of Britney Spears' perfumes, though others might disagree. But from about 6 cm away, it smells like gummy bears, and I do like that a lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2319125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2319125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303495" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sheepieboo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2224924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2224924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sheepieboo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303495ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303495" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2224924">sheepieboo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 08:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>take this review with a grain of salt because i dont like any of ariana's perfumes<br />
<br />
smells like straight up alcohol on the opening and as it settles it starts getting sweeter but it has this gross undertone that reminds me of pickles or vinegar. i blind bought this and god i regret it, i just use it for going to the gym now as im trying to empty out the rest of it. cute bottle though. 3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2303495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2303495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296617" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296617" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaddieMdsl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/388916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.388916.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaddieMdsl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Pure-XS-For-Her-51424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure XS For Her"title="Pure XS For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296617ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296617" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/388916">MaddieMdsl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 03:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I liked immediately after it came out but I wasnt willing to pay the initial price for lets say it, another celeb fragrance. It wasnt also anything that floored me, I just found it pleasant and I remembered liking it. In the summer I bought it for a reasonable price.<br />
Its lovely, on me it is truly sweet like candy, the fruitiness of initial spray quickly changes to a boiled candy (but good quality) with a dose of vanilla for a base so its not sour. Its lovely and happy smelling, definitely targeted for a younger audience due to the rather small projection. Its just generally safe to use, doubt itd offend anyone unless they are super close. This is also why it works in the summer heat, its not too much.<br />
Will I buy again? Probably not but I will enjoy until it runs out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2296617"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2296617#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2291076" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560037">SueG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i got this in 2016 and HATED it!  It was very top and alcohol heavy.  I never got rid of it though, cuteness of the bottle, idk.  I was watching a youtuber who said that she did not like it at first but now that it had set for a couple years, she loved it! I stopped the video and ran upstairs to find mine, and sure enough, it is GORGEOUS!  Sweet, creamy, goodness.  Great work scent gourmand, sweet but not sexy and not screechy.  So glad I did not declutter this one.  Note to self:  Hold on to fragrances you dislike for a year or so, see if they change,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2282866"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2282866#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2281497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2281497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2269612" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MandM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2189050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2189050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MandM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Island-Fantasy-17575.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17575.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Island Fantasy"title="Island Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2269612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2269612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2189050">MandM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-02">09/02/24 20:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So happy I finally bought this perfume! When I was pregnant I craved the smell of Cotton Candy perfume. (Not cotton candy itself). So I looked up what perfumes smell like cotton candy and this came up. The Walmart cotton candy spray was really what did it for my cravings. But I had bought the Sweet Like Candy Body Spray and I loved it after the first couple tries. And now my son is over a year old and I finally bought the perfume. The smell I sprayed all the time when I was pregnant with him. Such a wonderful sweet, Marshmallow, whipped cream smell. I do not like florals. So I love that this perfume has very subtle florals. The black berry and pear in the beginning is to die for! Love!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2269612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2269612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266098" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="curlycomedy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2014858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="curlycomedy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khamrah"title="Khamrah"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); Reminds me of Midnight Fantasy by Britney Spears. I dont get any whipped cream or marshmallow sadly. I thought based on the rating I would like it more. It didnt stand out as a candy scent despite the name, so I layered Miim Miic 108 over it (Kayali Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar clone) to bring out the sweetness or at least add some.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2259630" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TJJ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1458157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TJJ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Romance-825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Romance"title="Romance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2259630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2259630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458157">TJJ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 11:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really enjoy this! True to the name as its sweetness combined with some tang instantly bring to mind Jolly Ranchers and Sweet Tarts. However, the top notes are where that ends  the soft and pillowy floral heart makes it appropriate for any age and any setting. With just the right amount of creaminess (whipped cream and marshmallows) to keep it from turning sour on my skin, Sweet Like Candy is an easy reach and I like it much better than Ari. Its performance is impressive as well and one of the reasons I rank it high since others in this category disappear quickly. A safe blind buy too!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2259630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2259630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251249" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its very sweet and fruity like a candy shop but anyone can wear this scent I think! It also lasts a decent amount of time on my skin which is amazing! Jagged edged matt pink bottle with the pom pom is super cute too!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2251249"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2251249#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249165" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="microwaveproofcat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896881"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1896881.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="microwaveproofcat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249165ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249165" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1896881">microwaveproofcat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite it's name, I feel like 'Ari' is a better candy scent, so if you're looking for something more sweet and candy-like, I would go for that one. This scent definitely has sweet, milky notes, but the floral and powdery notes give it a bit of a facelift, making it feel a bit more mature and elegant than expected. I would describe this as the bigger sister of 'Ari.' It's definitely not too complex, but for the price point and fun bottle design I'd say its worth it. It's a simple, youthful, scent I often find myself gravitating towards.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2249165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2249165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It also causes headaches because its just so sweet and powdery. 1/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2248556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2248556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2217306">Parffinpuffin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I personally really love fruity/sweet juvenile scents, however this doesnt do it for me. It is sweet, yes, however it smells EXACTLY like a rue 21 perfume. When I was like 9 I loved the rue 21 perfume, pink ice, something like that i believe, and this literally smells exactly like it. Not my cup of tea. Very generic and nothing special, if someone walked past me wearing it i definitely wouldnt stop them to ask what it is. Kinda smells like something floral youd smell out of a magazine. Very strong, and gives you a headache. It smells like an old lady whos trying to be young</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2244064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2244064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225979" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zahrababy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2065502"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2065502.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zahrababy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Cloud-50384.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50384.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cloud"title="Cloud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2065502">Zahrababy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-22">07/22/24 08:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first impression of this perfume was "this does not smell like sweet candy" the top notes I got were raspberry, blackberry, and bergamot. The middle notes were blackcurrant with a hint of anise and the base notes I got were blackcurrant with a hint of vanilla. I sadly didn't get any whipped cream or marshmallow. I expected this perfume to be very sweet and creamy like cloud but sweeter, but boy was I very wrong. This perfume is just straight up fruity and that's it. It smells exactly like dark kiss from bbw so If you want to purchase slc, I'd reccomend trying dark kiss first, if you like it then you'll love slc because they're pretty much the same fragrance. If you're looking for a true marshmallow, whipped cream, vanilla, coconut dessert type of fragrance then I'd reccomend cloud by ari, it smells sweet and heavenly </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Its a very gourmand scent and smells a candy store. The notes I pick up on are sugar, whipped cream, pear and a slight floral smell. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218861" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hayven"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.114156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hayven" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Pure-Poison-214.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.214.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure Poison"title="Pure Poison"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218861ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218861" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114156">Hayven</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-14">07/14/24 22:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to like this! I love the bottle design and the shade of pink. I love sweet scents! The juice is just too much for me. This is super short on the sweet with a tinge of somethingvinyl? Plastic? Its sour cheap gum residue after the sweetness has gone away.  I cant quite figure out what notes are causing that effect because the same notes are in the red bottle, and that one smells fabulous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1313563">LaMiaRosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 02:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can hardly smell anything. I would describe it as airy and fruity, not as sweet as I was expecting. I don't dislike it, it's just okay to me. It's one of my least favourite Ari scents though. In one word: underwhelming.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2185649"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2185649#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180909" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cflatorrev"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927764"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1927764.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cflatorrev" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Dolce-Gabbana-Pour-Femme-Intense-18837.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18837.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme Intense"title="Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927764">cflatorrev</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-07">06/07/24 05:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So. I finished my 30 ml bottle and here are my thoughts (Im a woman, 27 yo, criminal lawyer so understand when I say that I cant wear this to work, not being bitchy about that, the perfume it is not the vibe if you are going to a prison, if you were wondering ). <br />
I actually enjoyed this one more than Ari or Moonlight (which I loved but that one lasts even less than this one), the only problem is that it doesnt last, on clothes maybe a bit longer but yea that sucks. It is very girly sweet candy but not in a pink sugar way, it is creamy and pleasant, it was a scent that helped me with my anxiety and stress levels  but I only wore it at home because it is a bit childish, not cheap, childish, and Im saying ish because I really think that any Britney Spears fragrance is more childish than this. It is very light, creamy, sweet, inoffensive. The only thing is the longevity. No more than 1-2 hours and gone. Thats the only reason why Im not buying it again, because it does bring me calm and I loved wearing it to bed. What a shame! But smells amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2180909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2180909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178256" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lulufartba"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2146680"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2146680.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lulufartba" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Mmmm-40461.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40461.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mmmm..."title="Mmmm..."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178256ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178256" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2146680">lulufartba</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 18:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume underwhelmed me. For starters I was expecting a much sweeter scent. Initially, the scent is promising, but the dry down leaves almost no scent. However, I don't think this is the perfumes fault- I think it just doesn't work with my skin's chemistry. I'm going to try it out for a bit and see if my opinion changes as I wear it, but as of now, I'm not very satisfied with the fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2178256"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2178256#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2029931">PhantomBelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 17:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a really good combination of gourmand and floral, berry and sweet but wow do I wish it was louder and stronger. <br />
<br />
Cute bottle, I would buy this on sale somewhere if I needed another bottle in the future. The scent is fantastic but it doesn't last for more than 2 hours for me, hardly projects. Overall it's an easy reach and a casual/office friendly scent. The safest blind buy of them all, other than maybe Moonlight. <br />
Purchased from: Jomashop</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2168738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2168738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167968" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like it better than Ari. It's so fun and sweet. I said I feel like a teen girl but I think anyone can like and wear this, just depends on your vibe. Definitely more suited for the younger crowd though. I do prefer Cloud as it nails a better balance between young and mature. But this one is very fun, kinda cheeky. Reminds me of bubblegum and springtime by a pool with brightly colored inner tubes.<br />
<br />
Finally realized the perfect word to describe it: cute.<br />
<br />
Changed my mind I think I like Ari better lol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2159146"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2159146#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2157262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
