padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151092" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stummy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820600"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1820600.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stummy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151092ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151092" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1820600">stummy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-09">05/09/24 18:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet like candy smells like creamy candy, evoking a sensation of pure indulgence. With every spritz, I'm transported into a world where I feel like a graceful princess, adorned in the fragrance's charming aura.<br />
<br />
The bottle itself is a testament to its charm, exuding a playful elegance that perfectly complements the scent within. However, as much as I adore it, I'd avoid using it in Texas' summer heat, as its sweetness might become a bit overwhelming in such intense warmth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2151092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2151092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2149821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2149821" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rita1inrat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2126008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rita1inrat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2149821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2149821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2126008">rita1inrat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>first real perfume i ever invested in because it smells exactly like this cotton candy aerosol body spray from avon that i wore CONSTANTLY growing up.<br />
[edit: correction: it was cotton candy by prince matchabelli lol] <br />
<br />
the problem is im not 8 years old anymore so smelling like sickly sweet cotton candy is very disorienting now. just doesnt fit my vibe anymore. and the avon cotton candy one lasted WAY longer too. this perfume lasts like 10 minutes and you have to be touching your nose to your skin to smell it. ridiculous for an EDP imo.<br />
<br />
i mean really, the only note i get out of this perfume is cotton candy. the kind that you got a huge bag of at a carnival as a kid and ate all of it at once and then got a tummy ache and couldnt eat cotton candy again for 4 years.<br />
<br />
bottle is cute, probably my least favorite of all the ari bottles though. the paint chips just like everyone says. <br />
<br />
i gave it to a friend who fits the scent better than i do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2149821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2149821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2149510" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Super sweet, I can imagine layering it with other fragrances to add that little cotton candy sweetness. I must say I love it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2115025"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2115025#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110926" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anamawsity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1997817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anamawsity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817">anamawsity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Super sweet but has a sharpness that just doesnt sit well with me. The sharpness fades after about an hour, but in its place it leaves an almost sour fruitiness. All in all, Im just not a fan. It also has very minimal sillage and only lasts a few hours. In terms of perfumes listed as similar<br />
 Kayali Vanilla Candy: similar for the first 30 minutes, then turns more floral heavy<br />
 Arianas Ari: much less sharp<br />
 Arianas Mod Blush: more floral<br />
 Britneys Fantasy: much more fresh<br />
 Ellis Brooklyn Apple Love: not as sharp<br />
 JC Viva la Juicy Noir: more floral heavy<br />
 JC Viva la Juicy Sucre: much fresher<br />
 Skylar Boardwalk Delight: not nearly as sharp</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2110926"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2110926#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108999" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108999" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lilymichelle01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2045554"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2045554.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lilymichelle01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nest/Wild-Poppy-53153.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53153.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wild Poppy"title="Wild Poppy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108999ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108999" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2045554">lilymichelle01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Exactly as described. It's sweet like candy without being over the top. Pretty comparable to Britney Spears Midnight Fantasy. I enjoy more floral notes included with my perfume, but I wouldn't mind wearing this. It's very light and inoffensive. Perfect for anytime use. It's definitely more fruity than a cream/vanilla type scent, but not in a bad way. If you're looking for something light this is the way to go.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2108999"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2108999#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106763" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It needs to me resprayed or oversprayed to stay on your skin more than an hour, and more than two on clothes. <br />
I bought it with the set that came with the body souffle, the perfume itself and the body spray, and if I use them all together I get a little bit more sillage on this<br />
bit overpriced for what it gives you, but it's a very inoffensive smell, it can be worn by any age and I think it's school and work appropriate as it's not too much for the nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2089153" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ariel5914"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918765"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1918765.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ariel5914" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2089153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2089153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); "sweet like candy"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2089153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2089153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2089123" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It also doesnt get more generic than this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2089123"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2089123#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2085767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; On clothes, it's nice, sweet, gourmand, and powdery (in a good way), but on the skin, it smells awful - a fish-like scent mixed with plastic. The longevity is awesome. I don't think I'd buy this again but it's worth having in your collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2079986"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2079986#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079981" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's a beautiful, sweet girly smell. My only issue is with the longevity. If this fragrance lasted longer, this would probably be Ariana's best perfume. <br />
<br />
This scent is very Electra Heart Teen Idle Marina and the Diamonds era.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2079981"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2079981#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2079880" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ep&auml;Vakaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1603741"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1603741.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ep&auml;Vakaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2079880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2079880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); I knew one girl who wore it at a summercamp and it was so sweet and feminine that I instantly fell in love. <br />
One way or another she had sprayed some of the fragrance on my hoodie, and 2 weeks later the hoodie still had a strong scent of it. <br />
This fragrance will definetly leave a trail of pure heaven behind, that will activate everyones odorant receptors to their fullest to savour the smell.<br />
10/10 never falling out of love from the smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2079880"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2079880#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2078184" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057624" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Purse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2009587"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Purse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057624ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057624" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2009587">Purse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-09">02/09/24 17:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pretty straightforward candy fragrance. On its own this smells like a juvenile body splash, but have found that it layers really well other fragrances. Since it is such a simple scent, I have been able to throw it on top of some other fragrances to soften/sweeten them up. This is also nice to pair with eos Vanilla Cashmere if youre one of those girlies.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2057624"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2057624#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2056497" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Anniechannie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921202"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1921202.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Anniechannie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Elixir-78581.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78581.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Elixir"title="Angel Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2056497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2056497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921202">Anniechannie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 15:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has been a go-to for me since it came out. I adore the bottle, and it got me into collecting fragrances. I love sweet scents and this one really hits that. To me, it is very bright and light. No heaviness here. The longevity on me is decent, about 5-6 hours. I'd say the sillage is close to the skin-arms length, depending. It's a great buy for the price in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2056497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2056497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055259" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its very sweet, but not heavy. Its fresh and light. I literally showered myself in this and like alot of people are saying - it doesnt last long. A skin scent for sure, but I can also like that in the summer or just when I dont want to smell very heavily of perfume. The bottle is cute and its cheap so I would recommend if you like sweet perfumes :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2055259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2055259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smelled fine when I sprayed it on a paper, but it was a complete disaster on my skin! Smell just like toilet freshener and plastic. The sillage and longevity was poor.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2053496"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2053496#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2047857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345004">DilyanaG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-05">01/05/24 03:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has just arrived! I love it! Its sweet but not overwhelming and I think it could possibly be worn in summer too. A perfect everyday girly smell! Now Im gonna see the longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2020987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2020987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like the scent but not super impressed, think it comes across as slightly juvenile. Also it appears to be quite weak, I would normally prefer a strong projection. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2013438" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Liquid_Heart"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1940028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1940028.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Liquid_Heart" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2013438ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2013438" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1940028">Liquid_Heart</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-28">12/28/23 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was the second perfume I purchased a long time ago.<br />
On first spray, it's incredibly sweet, almost headache sweet. The blackcurrant is very strong to me. It's almost as if it's mixed with a red berry but I may be confusing that for the citrus bergamot.<br />
As juicy as this is, it's also also powdery which reminds me of a body spray which cheapens it unfortunately.<br />
To me the fruitiness overpowers the vanilla/marshmallow.<br />
When I sprayed it on me, the top notes die incredibly fast, within a few minutes and the scent is barely there. It almost smells a bit like sunscreen on me, but a nice sunscreen! Like I've been sitting in the sun and eating fruit.<br />
It's quite pleasant on me, not cloying. However it's so weak and doesn't last, like many have said.<br />
I think this is a safe buy for a teenager/young adult who loves sweet scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2013438"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2013438#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012426" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Somehow, the mini version smells similar to a synthetic cupcake and powdery skin. Not usually my taste, but if I ever want to smell like a teen on Valentine's, I'd go for this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2004426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2004426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004348" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2004348" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glambunni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1666515"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1666515.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glambunni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2004348ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2004348" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1666515">Glambunni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-18">12/18/23 09:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been wearing this perfume for a couple of years now as it became my replacement for Meow, however, I think I've outgrown the scent and I actually prefer Meow as it's a more lighter version of Sweet Like Candy. The pear note alongside the other fruit notes are very strong and it smells extremely sweet. I wouldn't say this is a vanilla nor marshmallow scent as it leans more to the fruity pear side with lots of sweets. Once this bottle is done, it's Thank You Next because that perfume smells divine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="2004348"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=2004348#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1977592" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xeannie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1819707"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1819707.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xeannie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1977592ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1977592" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1819707">xeannie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-15">11/15/23 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>sweet candies and marshmallow scent with hints of berries! <br />
<br />
this is my first Ariana Grande perfume that i wanted and the first one i bought! i got a sampler of the mist and fell in love more with the perfume (the longevity is the only difference). this scent embodies all the girlies who are not afraid to smell as sweet and playful as they look!<br />
<br />
 lasts 2-3 hours <br />
 weak projection, skin scent<br />
 9/10 - pink, girly, classy bottle design. love the pink pompoms!<br />
<br />
the sweetest and my favorite scent out of all my Ariana Grande perfumes! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1977592"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1977592#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1975445" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1975445" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="russianprincess98"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429002"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1429002.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="russianprincess98" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Hypnotic-Poison-219.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.219.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotic Poison"title="Hypnotic Poison"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1975445ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1975445" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429002">russianprincess98</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-13">11/13/23 02:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like a bag of sweets + marshmallows, not in a cloying way - but in an airy/creamy bubble. <br />
<br />
This perfume is for people who don't like strong scents, who like to have an AURA instead of a perfume. <br />
<br />
Longevity is short, but I have the biggest bottle and I don't mind reapplying. I don't care if this perfume is considered childish, I enjoy smelling like a marshmallow fairy and I will continue to do so ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1975445"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1975445#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1965707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; would make a perfect first perfume for a preteen or teen girl. It is extremely weak though.  When sprayed on clothes there is a very mild raspberry which later turns creamy/woodsy. On my skin though it disappears after 20 minutes even after over 15-25 sprays. the smell is definitely juvenile. super sweet, and i feel like the fruity sweetness overpowers the vanilla note.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1955078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1955078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1952728" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1952728" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="finalgirl01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1865825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1865825.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="finalgirl01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Fantasy-600.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.600.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fantasy"title="Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1952728ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1952728" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1865825">finalgirl01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-15">10/15/23 17:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another 'meh' fragrance by Ariana that I used maybe five times since purchasing upon release many years ago. This, like Moonlight, has no notes that makes it stand out against all the other thousands of celeb and inexpensive perfumes found at chemists. I honestly couldn't tell you how a single note this perfume is said to smell like actually smells like because it just has an aroma of a chemical concoction with no thought in the making of it. <br />
Avoid if you already own Ari, Moonlight, Cloud or Mod Vanilla - they're basically all the same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1952728"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1952728#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949412" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AncientModernAncient"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1815719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AncientModernAncient" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Donna-Karan/DKNY-Be-Tempted-39240.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39240.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="DKNY Be Tempted"title="DKNY Be Tempted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815719">AncientModernAncient</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-11">10/11/23 12:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells so, so good but it's so, so weak. I bought the lotion/body wash/body mist for layering to help, but even then, can't get any kind of scent bubble or projection. It's such a shame because this is such a pretty, sweet but not juvenile scent. I can't stand Cloud or or TUN because they remind me of BR450 but thankfully this fully skirts that profile.<br />
<br />
I find it hard to discern individual notes, it just has a pleasant, slight cotton candy sweetness to it, not fruity or floral to me at all despite all the white florals and the blackberry. I really think it's great for a cozy night in on the couch and is so inoffensive, and after half a lifetime of pretending I hate sweet scents (I don't! long live the sugar!), I picked up a bottle at Ross for $22. I wouldn't pay more as it doesn't last.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1949412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1949412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1947427" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1947427" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chloejade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1859713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chloejade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Irresistible-Givenchy-60891.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60891.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Irresistible Givenchy"title="Irresistible Givenchy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1947427ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1947427" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1859713">chloejade</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-08">10/08/23 19:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The bottle is very cute, but unfortunately the perfume doesnt do much for me. To me, its sweet, powdery, and slightly airy, and I really dont mind it! Very feminine and youthful, albeit simple, but the biggest downside is definitely the longevity and projection. Its very poor. I sprayed it on myself to write this review and my nose had to be against my skin to smell it even only a minute after spraying. The scent is nothing too special and the strength is on par with body sprays, unfortunately. I cant even reach for this just for home because I cant smell it on myself at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1947427"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1947427#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722001">mabelangel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-04">10/04/23 01:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>to be straightforward: i dont like this. for 50-60 bucks its way overpriced - it smells like cheap kids stuff youd get in a plastic bottle with a cute cartoony character on it. theres alot of notes for something so simple and juvenile. it barely, if at all, develops. all of arianas perfumes vaguely smell the same to me with minimal differences. it smells like a headachingly sweeter version of moonlight, which i actually enjoy. i can see why people like this but its grossly sweet to me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1943721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1943721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942386" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1942386" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MoonFlare"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/962697"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.962697.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MoonFlare" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sarah-Jessica-Parker/Stash-SJP-40750.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40750.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Stash SJP"title="Stash SJP"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1942386ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1942386" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/962697">MoonFlare</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-02">10/02/23 08:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Even though there are plenty of notes in this fragrances it's pretty 1 dimensional, it generally smells like sweet tarts/shock tarts and marshmallows. It doesn't last very long, either. Less than 2 hours! The dry down it powder-y and floral sweet. I haven't come across a fragrance like this, not that it's particularly unique. It's hard to go wrong with this, if your gifting this to young highschool girl. It's a good beginner perfume if your inexperienced with the complexity of fragrance. <br />
<br />
I saw her Thank U, Next fragrance commercial and I'm assuming her fanbase are high schoolers, and young people, and that's what her fragrance line is marketed towards..<br />
<br />
I'm just saying this definitely isn't a mature fragrance (Not because it's sweet, but because there no depth) it definitely does not evolve while wearing it. That being said, in my opinion it's definitely NOT worth 50-60 bucks, when a body spray is equivalent to the formula of SWL. <br />
<br />
Anyway, there nothing wrong with loving not-so-adult and non-complex fragrances. Fantasy by Britney Spears is more complex (not by much though) then SWL, you can smell the top, middle and base notes with cupcake throughout, and it last awhile. For my taste, id rather dish out money for fragrances that dont perform like body spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1942386"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1942386#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1940199" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Dont waste money on that crap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1928425"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1928425#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1925943" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1925943" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sie_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1829828"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1829828.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sie_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39970.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Like Candy"title="Sweet Like Candy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1925943ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1925943" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1829828">sie_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-12">09/12/23 04:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is just so girlie. I really love it. Really nostalgic to me as it's my first perfume. Pity it barely lasts that long. It's slightly overpriced yet I still find myself re-purchasing it as I just love the scent. If you're someone who doesn't like constantly spraying themselves due to bad longevity I don't recommend this, but if you don't mind - go for it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I personally find it quite strong and heady. It lasts well but if I spray too much I do get a headache. I wish I got a smaller bottle as I dont reapply due to headaches. None of my other fragrances do tho. 4/5 for that reason</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1924190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1924190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1924142" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sweet candyish notes but not so much that it overpowers the fruity notes.  There's a good balance between the 2.  I find this to be very long lasting on me. There's a freshness to this scent that a lot of sweet candy like perfumes don't have.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1924142"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1924142#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1922721" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I smell the berry, pear, marshmallow and a bit of floral. Shes fresh, sweet, and addictive. However the EDP and body mist have no longevity at all :( stays on for a hour then quickly starts to go away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1918357"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1918357#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1916791" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1916791" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AinoKaroliina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810813"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1810813.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AinoKaroliina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1916791ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1916791" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810813">AinoKaroliina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-01">09/01/23 02:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I immediately sense the very sweet pear note in the top notes and then after a while I get the marshmallow and whipped cream, so it does remind me of Ari a bit, but what makes this different is the noticeable blackberry and blackcurrant notes. <br />
<br />
From the name of this perfume you might think you are getting something quite juvenile and predictable, but the blackberry and blackcurrant add a bit more grown and sophisticated tone to this perfume and make it more interesting.<br />
<br />
I wish this was longer-lasting. After two hours of applying it's pretty much gone. It's a nice perfume if you don't mind the need for several touch ups during the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1916791"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1916791#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
