align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1914779"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1914779#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1913674" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1913674" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="prettygrimace"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720591"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1720591.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="prettygrimace" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1913674ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1913674" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720591">prettygrimace</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-28">08/28/23 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this was the first perfume i got from miss ariana and at the time it was the only perfume i had out of like maybe 5 total fragrances (the rest were some bbw body mists lol). so first off, this doesn't last very long on my skin but i kinda don't mind? i wear body mists most of the time so longevity is never a deal breaker for me. my issue is that i don't really get marshmallows from this perfume. i only get plasticky fruity and floral vibes from it. honestly it's not as sweet as it could be. but i used to wear this a lot in high school and really loved it lmao. i think now i prefer ari over slc since it's sweeter and i can actually smell the marshmallow note in it. my 3.4 fl oz of slc is on its last few sprays and i don't think i'm going to buy it again, but it was fun while it lasted. &lt;3</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1913674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1913674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1906544" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScienceHippies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1817905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1817905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScienceHippies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1906544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1906544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1817905">ScienceHippies</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-19">08/19/23 19:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Background for this review: I prefer to use a bit of essential oil and I tend to be sensitive to heavily fragranced products. Even perfumes worn by others often give me headaches so I'm on a scent mission.<br />
<br />
I decided to blind buy the SLC bodyspray before committing to a full bottle after finding fragrantica and reading reviews. I figured the bodyspray would be a gentle way to experience the scent. Concentration aside, I agree with others that the longevity of this scent is disappointing. It was still fairly alcohol/hairspray at first and that hid any other top notes for me, but as it dried down I picked up that sugar/marshmallow note and that was very nice. Very bery nice. I enjoy genuine sweet scents and this was satisfyingly authentic. I've handmade marshmallows before and calling this fragrance 'immature' or 'childish' is inaccurate, and its sad that's used pejoratively. If anything this makes me remember my grandmothers 70s era kitchen and her baking deserts for church potlucks. Its a comforting, vintage 'made with real sugar' scent. Sadly that joy only lasted about 10 minutes before it faded into a vague powdery scent and then nothing at all. I didn't get any berry or even much floral. I like this better than most popular commercial fragrances but that brief sugar fix isn't enough for me, and I don't think I could get through the repeated hairspray opening or SLC product layering (lotions, bodyspray, perfume) that it would take. I'm not giving up on this because it was so satisfying, but I'm still looking for better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1906544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1906544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1902303" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Muppetslayer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793172"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Muppetslayer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1902303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1902303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793172">Muppetslayer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-14">08/14/23 18:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love SLC! I just wish it lasted longer. With Ari and Cloud I can get a little scent bubble going on for several hours, SLC not so much (even when using the body wash and lotion). It becomes a skin scent more quickly than the aforementioned. I usually pair it with the SLC body spray (which I got first) and it does helps to boost the scent though I feel like they are slightly different, at least to my nose. Tonight I layered SLC with bbw strawberry pound cake before bed and it is so yummy. Dunno if Ill be using this combo to go to work in the office, but I will def vibe out with this creamy concoction on my downtime.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1902303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1902303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1901925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1901925" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="la_belle_duchesse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697407"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1697407.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="la_belle_duchesse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/Very-Good-Girl-65560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Very Good Girl"title="Very Good Girl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1901925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1901925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697407">la_belle_duchesse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-14">08/14/23 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first Ariana Grande fragrance that I bought and I am really enjoying it. I saw some people describe it as very sweet and juvenile but while it may not be as "sophisticated" or "mature" I still think this can be worn by any age if you like sweet scents. What I experience most with this fragrance is a whipped cream sweetness and what must be marshmallows, with an added fruitiness from the black currant, berry and pear notes. It is those notes that for me tone down the sweetness, and make it more refreshing. I think this fragrance could be worn in any season, even in the summer but maybe not on very hot, humid days. The longevity is a few hours, it is not a very "loud" scent, so you could definitely reapply after a while. I once got a compliment on it, shortly after I sprayed it, so I think the sillage is decent in close vicinity, but it is more of a skin scent. <br />
<br />
It is a nice, cozy scent that I will probably be using more during the colder months. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1901925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1901925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1899885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This ish is delicious and reminds me of fun times.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1899885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1899885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1898106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1898106" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chesca32"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chesca32" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coco-Mademoiselle-611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Mademoiselle"title="Coco Mademoiselle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1898106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1898106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810758">Chesca32</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-09">08/09/23 15:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sickeningly sweet and bears a striking resemblance to a cheap body spray I had in highschool in the 00s. Wears off within 30 mins. Ill stick with cloud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1898106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1898106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1896584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1896584" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fruity_iykwim"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761110"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1761110.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fruity_iykwim" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fine-ry/Without-A-Trace-91430.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91430.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Without A Trace"title="Without A Trace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1896584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1896584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761110">fruity_iykwim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-07">08/07/23 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this was my signature scent for a minute, until i picked up ari. it has her signature dna and is in the same scent family, but feels a little more grown up to me. brown sugar, raspberry and grapefruit. less of a pure sugar thing.<br />
<br />
that said, this is lovely and i still use it for a pick-me-up on days i dont go to work. it's definitely sweet, but not crazy sweet if youre already a gourmand lover. feels like more of a fluffy, lactonic thing to me than a jolly rancher.<br />
<br />
bottom line - it has really good projection and longevity for the price. pick it up at Marshall's or one of the outlets, it's almost always there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1896584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1896584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1894588" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1894588" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rosegoldrosie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1227758.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rosegoldrosie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1894588ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1894588" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227758">rosegoldrosie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-04">08/04/23 23:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I owe SLC an apology! I never bothered smelling this one because of the name and branding, I thought it seemed really young and would be sickly sweet. But I tried it in the store the other day and omg it is gorgeous! I wouldn't say this is the sweetest of her scents at all; Ari has a burnt sugar/burnt marshmallow smell which I expected SLC to have but even more so, but turns out SLC is more juicy fruit, creamy, and warm sweet. It smells beautiful and I couldn't stop sniffing myself, so I purchased a bottle and have been getting compliments everytime I wear it. Cloud is still my favourite from Ariana, but SLC is up there with Moonlight as my next favourite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1894588"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1894588#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1891608" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="softhe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1698614"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1698614.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="softhe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-Now-81792.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81792.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idle Now"title="Idle Now"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1891608ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1891608" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1698614">softhe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-01">08/01/23 03:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Word of advice - dont bother getting the 100ml bottles from AG, unless youve already tried the fragrance and know it works for you.<br />
I LOVE sweet like candy, it honestly smells so good that its edible. The major cons are that its gone in 30mins and theres no projection. Somehow - it was worse than moonlight and I didnt even know that was possible, and it felt like moonlight disappeared immediately!!! I over sprayed the shit out of this juice and not much changed. It sucks because its affordable and smells delicious, but because of the lack of staying power I wont purchase it again, which is such a shame.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881430" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nicolevanduinen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1487186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1487186.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nicolevanduinen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Femme-Dylan-Purple-76274.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76274.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Femme Dylan Purple"title="Versace Pour Femme Dylan Purple"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881430ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881430" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1487186">Nicolevanduinen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-18">07/18/23 10:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume smells like a cherry flavored lollipop when you first apply it on your skin. However, I have found that the scent disappears extremely fast and this disappointed me a little bit. I really do wish it lasted longer. I also want to draw attention to the design of the bottle, as it will not shatter when it is dropped (believe me I did drop it and I am glad it is not made of glass.... and thank god for the fluffy part too). I would say that this scent is a little young and immature, but wouldn't discourage adults from wearing it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1881430"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1881430#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1878893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1487403">baekhyun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-04">07/04/23 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>indeed very sweet, but i don't really get candy with all the creaminess. it's much more like a fruit tart with all the berries and some floral accents. unfortunately does not last long, but could be nice for layering with other perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1871168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1871168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1866965" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kurtawluv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761966"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1761966.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kurtawluv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/SOL-Cheirosa-62-Eau-de-Parfum-60095.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60095.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SOL Cheirosa 62 Eau de Parfum"title="SOL Cheirosa 62 Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1866965ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1866965" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761966">Kurtawluv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-28">06/28/23 22:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet like candy has been my go to scent for a couple years now. It's cute, feminine, playful, and mixes well with so many different fragrances. If I could describe what I smell, I would say that it comes out with a very citrus and marshmallow mix which is so lovely. Then I notice as it dries down a bit you can smell more of the powder note. This is also my boyfriend's favorite fragrance I own, so it's popular with the guys as well if that is an important factor to you. Overall I would say this is a safe blind buy for most who like sweet scents and it is very affordable, so if you don't totally love it- you won't be loosing a whole lot of money. I recommend it to all of my friends even just to sweeten up other fragrances or to wear alone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1866965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1866965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1864472" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1864472" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="icedrosetea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1630435"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1630435.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="icedrosetea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1864472ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1864472" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1630435">icedrosetea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-25">06/25/23 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>very cute and pretty scent. this scent is what girls that use sparkling body wash, wear silver and diamond jewelry, bows in their hair, pink matching sets and glittery lip gloss would use. i prefer using this in the winter as opposed to warm weather since it becomes less generic and gives off a frosted sugar berry scent. lasting power and sillage is also great for the price, but make sure not to overspray or it becomes sickly sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1864472"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1864472#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1864188" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1864188" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aa:]05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1776486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aa:]05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1864188ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1864188" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1776486">aa:]05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-25">06/25/23 07:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is a few years old now, could be about 4 but I have re bought it 3 times because I loved the scent! So its a formulation from 2018/19. To be honest the power of it has decreased with age:(<br />
Initial spray- fruity opening, smells like sour pears, blackberries, not so much the Bergamot but its there very slightly. <br />
After an hour- smells like sweet blackcurrants and whipped cream, its much more soft than earlier, could be due to age though as it used to be stronger. <br />
After three hours- mostly Jasmine, vanilla and whipped cream as of now, but the strength has decreased quite a bit, it lingers on the skin and doesnt project as well as about an hour ago<br />
After five hours- the scent is fading away now almost completely, all thats left is like a faint vanilla whipped cream.<br />
After ten hours- nothing now:) Id probably reapply after 4 hours.<br />
Sillage- 5/10<br />
Longevity- 4.5/10 strongest for about 3 hours then quuuickly fades<br />
Scent- 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1864188"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1864188#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1862576" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can see how someone could think its cloying. I just get straight up powdered sweet tarts and sugar. There is a hint of a bright citrus which I think helps it not be too sweet. If you wanna smell pretty and delicious get this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1862576"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1862576#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1857063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1857063" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sombra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/329419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.329419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sombra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Yum-Boujee-Marshmallow-81-99254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"title="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1857063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1857063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/329419">Sombra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-15">06/15/23 12:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont understand why people say Aris perfumes are for teenagers and some sort of young audience. Though they are mostly sweet, easy to wear and pleasant smelling, they are not young. In fact, perfumes neither have sex nor age - anyone can wear them the way they want and any time they like. This is why perhaps you see so many unisex tags among niche perfumes.<br />
As it comes to this scent - Im in my early thirties and I really like it. Id say I love it if the longevity was more than 1hour and it did not evolve into a skin scent so fast. But I definitely smell the majority of the mentioned notes and this is a mouth-watering experience. Very yummy and pleasant.<br />
I wish 100 ml bottle was not so heavy so it could be placed in a bag easily to refresh the scent during the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1857063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1857063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/132362">pinuprock</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-14">05/14/23 22:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another cheap, generic , sweet mass produced scent.<br />
I was super optimistic since Im always looking for a nice gourmand. I researched and read reviews everywhere, at first I thought it was a bit expensive for a celebrity scent. But I went with it and bought it. I was instantly hit with alcohol and a reminiscence of a remade of fantasy by Britney Spears, this perfume sucks and has no staying power or silage, I gifted it to my 7 year old, she loves it. If you want to buy something nice buy save a penny and buy something nicer, not worth the price or anything very disappointed </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1833244"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1833244#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1832136" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1832136" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="0h3ricaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733395"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733395.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="0h3ricaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1832136ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1832136" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733395">0h3ricaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-13">05/13/23 10:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive had this perfume twice, it was one of my first perfumes that got me into collecting! I went through the first bottle and my second bottle had a little less than half, but by then I was already over this fragrance. I ended up giving the rest to my cousin. It is very sweet, but I honestly just outgrew it. It is juvenile but nonetheless, a great fragrance. My cousin ended up buying her own bottle plus the body spray. <br />
<br />
Perfect for teens or for anyone who wants to start collecting. Its cute, sweet, and a nice pink scent. It CAN be a bit cloying and a tad bit synthetic. It is not a beast mode perfume, but great for everyday. <br />
<br />
Perfect for picnics, shopping, and a nice day out in the sun. Nice to wear with shorts, skirts, sun dresses, natural makeup, ponies.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1832136"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1832136#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1831582" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sweetboy05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1702817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sweetboy05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dumont/Nitro-Red-73023.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73023.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nitro Red"title="Nitro Red"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1831582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1831582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702817">Sweetboy05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-12">05/12/23 14:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This really does smell like sweet candy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1831582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1831582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831343" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1831343" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dani D-va"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/742409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.742409.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dani D-va" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Yum-Boujee-Marshmallow-81-99254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"title="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1831343ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1831343" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/742409">Dani D-va</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-12">05/12/23 09:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"Childish" but hear me out! It smells like a children's body splash or bubble bath or hair detangling mist I had as a child (I can't quite remember what it is exactly) but it smells so nostalgic, fun and youthful to me. I don't really care if a perfume is juvenile or mature. If I like a scent, I'm going to wear it.<br />
It smells like a fruity candy. Not sugary cotton candy but rather something like starburst or jolly rancher where it's sweet but also juicy. Very fun, girly and uplifting.<br />
Not very long lasting but not too weak either. I get a good 4-5 hours of wear time. Projection is decent, maybe about an arms length but if I give myself a good heavy spritz I get compliments so people around me definitely smell it too. <br />
Overall for the price I am very happy with it. It's a fun, sweet, young scent that brings me nostalgic memories. Easily accessible and adorable packaging. I will always have a bottle of this in my collection!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1831343"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1831343#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1824273" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1824273" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gemsense"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1157351"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1157351.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gemsense" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nest/Madagascar-Vanilla-Perfume-Oil-66886.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66886.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Madagascar Vanilla Perfume Oil"title="Madagascar Vanilla Perfume Oil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1824273ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1824273" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1157351">Gemsense</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-03">05/03/23 17:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Late summer early fall is when this one is at her prettiest.  All the rest of the year she's boring and a one note sweet, too sweet blah scent.  That's my opinion but every time I wear it people always comment on how good I smell.  I think it's very similar to velvet sugar except velvet sugar turns weird on me where as sweet like candy really works well with my chemistry.  If I want to please others I choose this to wear but I'm not so crazy about it.  Like I said late summer is when sweet like candy shows off all her notes and sings at her best and that's when I like to enjoy her.  Any other time, although it garners compliments, I think it's waste to wear for she's just too plain Jane for my tastes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1824273"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1824273#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; On me, it smells like straight alcohol. It stings my nose when I smell it on any part of my body. I sprayed it and let it open a little, but just got bergamot and alcohol, no vanilla, cream, marshmallow, or cashmere.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1818669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1818669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1816456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1815374"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1815374#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1815214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1815214" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mea.fleur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mea.fleur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Slow-Dance-57007.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57007.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Slow Dance"title="Slow Dance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1815214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1815214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733007">Mea.fleur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-22">04/22/23 16:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A thick, creamy, whipped cashmere vanilla with dark berries. Good for layering or to wear to bed. First I detected a similarity to Burberry Her Elixir, but this one has the lactonic notes and keeps the (darker) berries in the background. Ive never smelled Her Intense, but I wonder if this is closer to that one. Really well blended. Found at Ross for less than half of retail.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1815214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1815214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1815126" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1815126" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blue Orchid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5582"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.5582.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blue Orchid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Flora-Gorgeous-Magnolia-83621.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83621.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flora Gorgeous Magnolia"title="Flora Gorgeous Magnolia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1815126ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1815126" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5582">Blue Orchid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-22">04/22/23 14:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a cute bottle. The fragrance, however, gets a big fat no from me. The scent appears to dissipate very quickly. There is no longevity at all to it.<br />
<br />
It smells very synthetic on me. There's nothing exciting about this scent, it comes across as really flat. I wanted to like it, but this one is not for me. Not feeling this at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1815126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1815126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1814358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1814358" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Beacon631"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703353.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Beacon631" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1814358ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1814358" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703353">Beacon631</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-21">04/21/23 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find that I reach for this often. For every day or when I need to put something on quick on my way out the door. It leans more feminine and is one of those floral yet not overwhelmingly powder scents. I think pink when I close my eyes. I bought this when it was still new. It lasts a long time on the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1814358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1814358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1813419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Might get a 30ml to compare, but i'm very dissapointed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1813419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1813419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1813097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
