            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1594357" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1594357" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/767184"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.767184.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Dolce-Violet-80038.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80038.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dolce Violet"title="Dolce Violet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1594357ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1594357" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/767184">Yosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-30">06/30/22 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My main goal at the perfume shop today was to test and compare SLC &amp; Ari, neither of which I have tested before. Sadly I dropped the paper strip right after leaving the shop! I had sprayed some on my arm, just not on a pulse point. <br />
<br />
To my nose 'Sweet Like Candy' is not as sweet as Ari. This is also sweet but WAY more subtle. The dark berries are there, not sharp or chemical-smelling, very nicely done. The whipped cream and marshmallow are there too. If you think of dark berries mixed with whipped cream and marshmallows, that's how SLC smells like, without too much added sugar. In a way the name is misleading because Ari is extra sweet - it's literally <i>sweet like candy</i> - so these two perfumes should swap names.   <br />
<br />
Reminds me of Viva La Juicy Noir. Very nice, soft, sweet but not too sweet, comforting scent. Quite dreamy too. Sadly I don't pick up the pear. And you need to be into dark berries to like this perfume, they create the atmosphere. <br />
<br />
I might prefer this during cooler seasons as a warm comforting scent. I don't necessarily associate whipped cream with summer ~ I want something ultra fresh and light this time of the year. SLC is not heavy though, I found Moonlight heavier thanks to the plum note. <br />
<br />
If you're thinking about blind-buying Ari, SLC or Moonlight, and don't know which one to choose, I'd say: <br />
-If you want the sweetest option out there, that's strong and bright, then go for Ari. <br />
-If you want a dark berry cream dessert that's still sweet yet more subtle, then go for SLC. <br />
-If you want a heavier plum dessert, which is also good for night-time, then go for Moonlight.<br />
<br />
They're all well done and beautiful in their own way, and the marshmallow is in all of them. To me, SLC and Ari are very different from each other. In fact, I find SLC to have more in common with Moonlight, though they're different too. All three are clearly in the same family though, share that same Ariana DNA.<br />
<br />
Lastly; I will not recommend these scents for specific age groups because putting age-limits on smells is unnecessary and restrictive. <b>Also</b> grown adults have sweet tooth's and therefor sweet smells don't belong <b>only</b> to kids, teenagers and early 20s. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1594357"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1594357#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1559260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1559260" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="butterflyboy528"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1493657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1493657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="butterflyboy528" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juicy-Couture/Viva-la-Juicy-4410.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4410.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viva la Juicy"title="Viva la Juicy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1559260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1559260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1493657">butterflyboy528</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-07">05/07/22 15:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OBSESSED! This smells like marshmallow berry vanilla cupcake. But, for me I can still smell the floral notes which balances it all out. When you spray it it can be overwhelming very sweet and strong but, when it sets it smells like a warm marshmallow. I can still smell it on my clothes DAYS later. I would say on the skin it lasts around 5-6 hours. Not too bad, I disgaree with this being "juvenile" there is no such thing. Wear what YOU WANT. This has become my new favorite and has potential to become my signature scent. HIGHLY RECCOMEND. It was a blind buy and I am happy I did :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1559260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1559260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1443576" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1443576" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="danibanani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1402922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="danibanani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Billie-Eilish/Eilish-70052.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70052.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eilish"title="Eilish"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1443576ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1443576" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402922">danibanani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-10">11/10/21 12:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my personal favorite from Arianas line of fragrance. My sister has thank u next, cloud, and rem. Out of those three, cloud reigns supreme followed by thank u next. REM does not stand out as much as her other scents but still pretty. Sweet like candy is just the perfect everyday scent for me when I wanna feel cute and feminine. I read a lot about Arianas perfumes and how they are for children which I think is just a low blow to her image. I dont think any scent should have an age attached to it. If you wanna smell sweet like candy at 95 you are more than welcome to.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1443576"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1443576#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1253647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1253647" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sticky Wipplesnit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262280"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1262280.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sticky Wipplesnit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/God-Is-A-Woman-68664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="God Is A Woman"title="God Is A Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1253647ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1253647" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262280">Sticky Wipplesnit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-27">11/27/20 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Two big thoughts right out of the gate:<br />
1) Sweet Like Candy is what I wanted Ari to be.<br />
2) Sweet Like Candy is what other people wanted Pink Sugar to be.<br />
<br />
Im a sucker for any fragrance described as creamy. Problem is, on my skin at least, very few live up to that promise. Theres always some annoying little fruit burp or sharp stinging note that ruins the composition. Sweet Like Candy toes that line, but ultimately remains creamy from first spray to last gasp... and Im hooked. HOOKED, I tell you.<br />
<br />
That snuggly cashmere woods note - the same note that soured a few otherwise-lovely Marc Jacobs fragrances for me - is what keeps SLC from smelling like a high school girls locker room. Ive heard this scent described as sort of Jolly Rancher/hard candy-esque, but honesty, its neither. What I pick up is sort of a soft, chalky, semi-powdery sweetness - almost like those Necco wafer candies, but in the best way possible.<br />
<br />
One other interesting thing about SLC is that it smells completely different depending on what part of your body you spray it on. On parts that get a lot of airflow - like your wrists - it pulls slightly masculine. But on warmer/hidden parts of your body - your cleavage, the crook of your elbow, etc. - the sweetness develops and takes on almost an ethereal quality. If AG Cloud (supposedly) smells exactly the way a fluffy blue cloud would smell, then SLC is its airy pink sky sister.<br />
<br />
The best part: SLC smells young, yes, but not so bubblegum floofy that I (nearing 40) feel like an ass wearing it. Time will tell, but this might - just MIGHT - dethrone Pink Sugar as my go-to fragrance.<br />
<br />
Edit/update: husband just came home and hugged me and said, Oh my God, you smell SO good. Usually if hes neutral about a fragrance Im test-driving, hell politely say, Is that a new one? Its nice. (The flip side: when he hates one, its an immediate Nope. Nope. NOOOOOPE. A gorgeous amber paste from Kuumba Made that I tried one time even made him dry-heave. YOU SMELL LIKE POTPOURRI *gagging noises*) So I guess SLCs a keeper. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1253647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1253647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent726871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc726871" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="seanjs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/302470"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.302470.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="seanjs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-N05-Vintage-608.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.608.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel N5 (Vintage)"title="Chanel N5 (Vintage)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma726871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd726871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/302470">seanjs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-07-26">07/26/16 05:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When it comes to celebrity perfumes for me, I don't care about the brand itself or the bottle, just the scent.<br />
<br />
"Sweet Like Candy" is delicious. True to it's name, Ariana's 3rd fragrance is precisely sweet like candy. There is nothing I can fault about this scent because the warning is already there that this perfume is absolutely SWEET! I love it, inoffensive, easy to wear and AMAZING on a pillowcase!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="726871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=726871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="39970" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">

    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

It's delicious and creamy. I can't smell it on me for more than an hour.<br />
Still like it regardless. The bottle is beautiful, but without the ugly pompom.<br />
It might suit teenage girls, but as a 29 year old woman this is not important to me. I wear perfume for my pure enjoyment.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="754238"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=754238#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1090925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1090925" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumeholic88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/96159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.96159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumeholic88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1090925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1090925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/96159">perfumeholic88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-24">08/24/19 09:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet candy. Literally. And this is nothing cool. It is difficult to say what ingredients dominate here, because the whole is blended to a smooth mass and smells literally like hard candy mixed with vanilla and even more hard candy. The smell is pink, "loud", although it does not strangle, which is because it has a moderate projection and does not stick to (my) skin for more than an hour. This composition reminds me of a 10-year-old girl dressed in a pink dress, pink shoes, with colorful bows in her hair neatly pinned into two ponies and eating a large, pink heart-shaped lollipop. Glitter is falling around, unicorns bucking, and of course, pink cotton candy clouds are gliding lazily. This is  insanely infantile scent. I don't like it at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1090925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1090925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent858942" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc858942" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ellenastokman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073826"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1073826.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ellenastokman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Nuit-Tresor-29157.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29157.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit Trsor"title="La Nuit Trsor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma858942ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd858942" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1073826">ellenastokman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-07">09/07/17 10:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its quite expensive for a perfume thats generic,synthetic smell and wont even last more than an hour on me :(<br />
Sweet yes.. but silage and lingevity very bad .i prefer limited edition..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="858942"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=858942#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1218546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1218546" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Palmer Eldritch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202620"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202620.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Palmer Eldritch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Mayar-84309.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84309.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mayar"title="Mayar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1218546ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1218546" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202620">Palmer Eldritch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-31">08/31/20 16:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm surprised with this one! It's fresh and even slightly sour!<br />
<br />
The opening is a juicy, fresh blackberry &amp; pear that is literally THE SAME as Katy Perry's 'Meow' EDP (which I have). Except meow has 100% better performance &amp; projection.<br />
However that's were the similarities end. <br />
<br />
On my skin within 10 minutes the marshmallow &amp; cream are dominant but its a complete skin scent. These aren't sweet or powdery but rather sour because of the extremely tart blackcurrant. No jasmine in sight. 2-3 hours later and 'Sweet Like Candy' has disappeared from my skin...<br />
<br />
Projection and longevity on my skin is INSANELY POOR. Worse than an EDT. From initial spray 'Sweet Like Candy' is a skin scent: I sprayed like 20 times and people around my household didn't even notice. After 3 hours the scent is 100% G O N E, despite having a nice depth! <br />
<br />
I can't justify owning 'Sweet Like Candy' when I have a far superior &amp; yummier scent: 'Meow' by Katy Perry. This is an 'Ehhhh' for me. <br />
<br />
Verdict: A very 'bright' feminine scent without artificial qualities. Surprisingly suitable for spring and summer. Great for bed time fun, flirts and dates. Not recommended for work environment. BEAUTIFUL, heavy bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1218546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1218546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1312016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1312016" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GabrielleeeeeW"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297965"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1297965.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GabrielleeeeeW" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Snif/Honey-Suite-99503.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99503.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Honey Suite"title="Honey Suite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1312016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1312016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297965">GabrielleeeeeW</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-22">03/22/21 09:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really don't like restricting fragrances into 'age groups' (still love Pink Sugar over here as a 27 year old) but this one just screams teenager. There is zero depth to it and it performs like a body spray-little projection and it was gone off my skin within 2 hours. It smells like sweet tarts and in a generic way, like so many other body sprays I've smelled before. Nothing unique or special at all about this one, which was disappointing because I love Cloud and think Thank U Next is also nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="39970"comment_id="1312016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Sweet-Like-Candy-39970.html?ccid=1312016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="39970" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="39970":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="39970" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

</div></div></div>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
